name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM Document (Legacy)
summary: Learn about .CDD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM is an amateur and professional diagramming application that documents simple and complex processes. The CDD format was the default format for saving diagrams (File → Save) in ConceptDraw DIAGRAM before CS Odessa replaced it with the CDDZ format. However, the software can still save diagrams as CDD files.

description: A CDD file is a diagram created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, a program used to create various types of flowcharts and technical drawings. It contains a drawing, such as a flowchart, technical drawing, or conceptual diagram, and may also store ConceptDraw Basic scripting language for manipulating drawing objects and automating repetitive tasks. CS Odessa replaced CDD files with the .CDDZ format when it released version 10 of ConceptDraw PRO (now ConceptDraw DIAGRAM).

instructions: You can open CDD files with CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM in Windows and macOS. To open a CDD file, select File → Open.
CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM can convert CDD files to various file types, including the following formats:
